name: Midas Everstake USD
description: mEVUSD is a tokenised certificate designed to provide exposure to market-neutral DeFi strategies and structured yield opportunities deployed across multiple blockchain ecosystems. The product is structured to reflect the aggregated performance of diversified, delta-neutral positions that seek to capture sustainable on-chain returns independent of market direction. Risk oversight and strategy monitoring are performed by MEV Capital, acting as the appointed Risk Manager, ensuring institutional standards of transparency and control throughout the strategy lifecycle.
